name: Santa Claus: Unchained
description:
Santa Claus' legend started to fade away slowly over time, with people spreading rumors of his nonexistence. He always accepted that with a heartwarming smile: as long as he could continue doing his job that one day of the year, he was happy. 

That suddenly took a turn when some people started claiming Santa's presents as their own, some even stealing the gifts from the old man himself.

Well... now he's had it, and he's got a very different "Merry Christmas" to wish them.

Give them hell.

Santa Claus: Unchained was developed in one day and a half as part of the YogsCast Gamejam. This is my first ever game and I'd love to hear your feedback in order to improve as a game developer!
